Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Dudda-le fayla lem Yallay qaranwaa kee baaxó qimbô gine, Malayka farmoytiitiy galwa-le abe Yallih amri guddussuh, nammay leemiiy, sidoc leemiiy, ferey leemi edde haadduh, isi ginóh isih faxem ossa. Diggah Yalli ummaanimil dudda-le
Yalli racmatak (rizqhiiy, roobuuy, niqmootak) sinaamah fakem toysa tet tabbixeeh cintam matan kaadu Usuk yibbixeeh waasem taceem matan kaak wadir, Yalli Usuk mayso-li, naggaara

Kee a-sinaamey Yalli siinih yecee niqmat cusa (kassita), Yallak kalah gineynay qaran kee baaxók sin yarzuqhe maay yan? (mayan) kaak- sa cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayanak, Yalla inkittossaanamak mannal daggawtaanaa
Nabiyow a-ķoros koo dirabbosse tet tekkek, toysa nummah kok duma farmoytit dirabboysinteh, kaadu caagiida Yallâ fanah gacsimta akeeral
Kee a-sinaamey diggah Yallih xagni numma, toysa addunyâ mano sin duquuruse waytay kaadu Yallak sin duquuruse waay duquuruseyni (sheetan kinnuk)
Diggah sheetanti siinik naqboytak toysa naqboytah kaa haysita, cagalah isi cizbiy isi kataate makoh fan seeca saqiir deqsitta urta giráh mara yakkeenî gidah
Koroosite mari gibdi digaalá- le akeeral, yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abe mari dambi cabtii kee kaxxa galtó-lon jannatal
